elements.name: DescribeGeneralAspects
elements.title: Please describe general aspects of good practices and lessons learnt, including at sub-national level1

elements.name: DescribeGoodPracticesClimate
elements.title: Please describe good practices and lessons learned related to climate modelling activities and methodologies - assessment of climate impacts, vulnerability and risks to climate change

elements.name: DescribeGoodPracticesInstitutional
elements.title: Please describe good practices and lessons learned related to institutional arrangements and governance at the national and sub-national level - policy and regulatory changes -  coordination mechanisms

elements.name: DescribeGoodPracticesAdaptation
elements.title: Please describe good practices and lessons learned related to adaptation priorities - adaptation barriers - adaptation goals, objectives, undertakings, efforts, strategies, policies and plans

elements.name: DescribeGoodPracticesEfforts
elements.title: Please describe good practices and lessons learned related to efforts to integrate climate change adaptation into development and sectoral policies, plans and programs - disaster risk reduction and management

elements.name: DescribeGoodPracticesStakeholder
elements.title: Please describe good practices and lessons learned related to stakeholder engagement - integration of gender perspectives into climate adaptation - integration of indigenous, traditional and local knowledge into climate adaptation

elements.name: DescribeGoodPracticesClimateRisk
elements.title: Please describe good practices and lessons learned related to climate risk communication

elements.name: DescribeGoodPracticesMonitoring
elements.title: Please describe good practices and lessons learned related to monitoring, reporting and evaluation

elements.name: DescribeGoodPracticesStrengthening
elements.title: Please describe good practices and lessons learned related to strengthening scientific research and knowledge - innovative adaptation solutions and innovative financing mechanisms
